name: Trent The Triangle
description:
Thank you for playing Trent the Triangle!

This is intended to be a VERY simple game anybody can enjoy.

Here's how to play:

Arrow keys (or click) to move, avoid the square enemies, they will push you into the red zone. Which will kill you. 

Squares with arrows push enemies back.

And that's it!

Have fun! :)

-WizBlob
